name: The Book Job
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Dan Vebber
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Yeardley Smith, Nancy Cartwright
plot: Homer and Bart put together a team to author the next successful tween novel franchise and make a million dollars, but discover that they need Lisa's help to pull it off.
